content: and weave it in and out along the top of the curls as pictured then pull tight to gather attach a needle to both the long starting tail and finishing tail together and sew the pigtails onto the head where desired if you want the doll to be able to wear hats sew them low down just behind the ears as pictured ~ ~ to find all of the clothing patterns for nelly containing over 70 individual clothing items not increase hair caps click here ~ ~ i hope you have enjoyed completing this pattern be sure to share your weebee nelly doll s with us on the weebee appreciation society facebook page link on first page and to add your project to ravelry ~ ~
